Reviews.Title: NOT SAMSUNG, NOT WHITE
Reviews.Author: Leslie
Reviews.Content: Don't be deceived, this product is NOT as described. I9300 is "SPY CAMERA" brand. It says "White" and it arrived Black. 1st battery was charged, and I switched out to the second battery to charge it, and it required the whole phone to be reset. Lost the time/date. How long has it been since you ever had to set the time/date on a phone? The screen locks up when it "sleeps" and requires several power down selections before it "behaves" properly. I am very dissatisfied with this purchase. It also describes the phone is in English, and that was also not true. Very difficult to navigate to settings and change to English when you don't even know what you are reading in a foreign language. Didn't come with a book.

Reviews.Title: highly disappointed
Reviews.Author: me
Reviews.Content: If there was an option to do less than one star I would. First off it was a day late when I paid extra for speedy delivery. That didn't bother me until I realized I got screwed all togethr. This phone is not as advertized at all. I wasn't even able to activate it through my carrier. Looks nice on the outside but once you turn it on, even the screen seems off. I suggest Amazon remove this advertizment all together.

Reviews.Title: HUGE disappointment.. and I wasn't expecting much.
Reviews.Author: Emily Ingersoll
Reviews.Content: This phone is awful. Number one if you're expecting a galaxy s3 or anything even close look again. I bought this knowing its a knockoff and not expecting much and I'm still horribly disappointed. It looks nothing like the pictures and is significantly smaller than the galaxy s3. It is not even an android system, it is set up exactly like the flip phones I used in eighth grade like 6 years ago. You cannot download apps, get on the internet without trying to throw the phone, or customize or change much at all. The camera is awful but that is actually on here and I knew it would be bad before I got it. The phone barely stays on I find myself having to turn it back on after it randomly turns off at all day. One good thing I can say is that the battery lasts FOREVER, but that's because I LITERALLY CANNOT RUN ANYTHING- facebook, internet, email.... nothing. There are better knockoff phones I know that for sure. This is a GIANT waste of money no matter what carrier you are using. Also, I am using this for straight talk and still haven't gotten the internet set up because the APN settings are just ridiculous and nothing how they should be. So I would definitely reccommend NEVER getting this.

Reviews.Title: terrible!!!

I got ripped off!!! terrible service as well! it took half a month longer than it was supposed to for me to FINALLY receive this awful phone! the camera is terrible as is everything else!!! I recommend anyone who wants to get this phone NOT TO DO IT! waste of time and money!

Reviews.Title: Don't purchase item. I'd give it no stars if I could.
Reviews.Author: rebecca
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone hoping to get a cheap replacement for my phone which I had lost to a washer. This item appealed to me because it was cheap and it said it had Prime Shipping, which I thought would be great since it would arrive two days later! I ordered this product on Dec 5th and after I paid it changed the arrive dates to Jan 20th. Over one month away! It is now Feb and I still haven't received the phone and I've had to file a claim. I would not buy this phone and this seller had lost my trust so I will not be purchasing from them.

Reviews.Title: I only recommend as a replacement phone
Reviews.Author: Santanna
Reviews.Content: I give this phone one star due to after I recieved it of course it's nothing like the galaxy 3, the screen is small doesent quite fit the  approximate size of 4 inches, the bottom right and left keys (options/back) are supposed to be touch sensored but, instead they are push button as well noticably the key for "home screen". The price of course is affordable for a touch screen phone due to others which are a more advance technology that causes them to be more expensive. So if you're looking for somewhat of a temporary replacement type phone then I would recommend this one because it's inexpensive for a touch screen.
